com.badlogic.gdx.graphics
Class Font

java.lang.Object
  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Font

public abstract class Font
extends java.lang.Object

A font returns glyph bitmaps for characters as well as some metrics. Does only work for left to right languages without surrogates.

Author:
mzechner

Nested Class Summary
static class Font.HorizontalAlign
          Horizontal text alignement
 class Font.TextRun
          A textrun is a mesh that holds the glyphs of the given string formated to fit the rectangle and alignment.
static class Font.VerticalAlign
          Vertical text alignement

Method Detail

newTextRun

public Font.TextRun newTextRun()
Creates a new Font.TextRun.

Returns:
The new TextRun.

dispose

public void dispose()
Disposes the font and all associated resources. Does not dispose the Font.TextRuns created via this Font.

Returns:
The height of a line in pixels

Parameters:

getStringWidth

public abstract int getStringWidth(java.lang.String text)
Returns the width of the string in pixels. Note that this ignores newlines.

Parameters:
text - The text to get the width for
Returns:
The width of the text in pixels
